attributes.title: ᵈᵒⁿᵗ ᵈᵒʷⁿˡᵒᵃᵈ ᵗʰⁱˢ ᵃᵖᵖ!!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and then it asked for my number so i said "oh hell nah" the next thing I know I get a text from Donald Trump and he threatened to drown my pet fish😰 don't download this app please!

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app cause trump2020, but as soon as I got it my phone received a virus and completely messed up my phone

attributes.title: Of what
attributes.review: It took 1 day to download 😠 and when I open it all I saw was a orange with sum clothes and when I got the app my phone started acting up

attributes.title: Horrible app!!!🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: This app takes FOREVER to download, a record 28 hours!!! The layout is absolutely trash, simply an eyesore. Overall, I’d give it a 0/10 if I could.

attributes.title: My phone no longer works
attributes.review: Bro this app made my phone blow up don’t download it, and rate it 1 star so that it doesn’t happen to you.

attributes.title: Glitchy app
attributes.review: This app made my phone slow and glitchy and now it doesn’t work

attributes.title: This app doesn’t work
attributes.review: It doesn’t load enough glitches a lot it just doesn’t work I’m really annoyed 🙄🙄

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!😡🤢
attributes.review: It literally took an entire week to download and then kept crashing over and over and wouldn’t work idk why. I just wanted to vote....😭😭😭

attributes.title: HUGE MISTAKE!! TREMENDOUS!!!
attributes.review: The app itself isn’t that bad. You know, except for all the lies and propaganda being spewed. But Trump? In general? Bunker boy is a 1 star president if I ever saw one. In fact, if I could I’d give this app zero stars. #bernie2020

attributes.title: Highly Upsetting
attributes.review: I’ve been a supporter for the last 75yrs & when i say i am DISAPPOINTED, I am NOT exaggerating! This not only took ALL OF the space on my phone 🤦🏽‍♀️ but CAME TO LIFE and ATE my pet fish. Absolutely ridonkulous, sigh.
